purpose_decision: Ensure governed API/record schemas match SR-TYPES/SR-SPEC expectations; prevent breaking changes without governance.
failure_conditions: Schema mismatch; breaking change; missing migration notes.

purpose_decision: Ensure asynchronous processing delivers at-least-once and idempotent handling where required; no lost events.
success_state_effect: May proceed to next workflow gate.
failure_conditions: Lost events; non-idempotent handling; ordering violations that change projections.

purpose_decision: Ensure only humans can emit binding approvals/decisions/freezes; system/agents cannot.
success_state_effect: May proceed to next workflow gate.
failure_conditions: Non-human actor emits binding record; missing attribution.

purpose_decision: Ensure loop budgets and stop triggers are configured per directive and enforced (hard stop on budget exhaustion).
success_state_effect: May proceed to next workflow gate.
failure_conditions: Budgets missing; stop triggers missing; hard stop not enforced.

purpose_decision: Ensure builds are reproducible under pinned toolchain/env.
success_state_effect: May proceed to next workflow gate.
failure_conditions: Non-reproducible build outputs; toolchain mismatch; missing lockfiles.

purpose_decision: Ensure required CI jobs pass (unit/lint/typecheck/etc per profile).
success_state_effect: May proceed to next workflow gate.
failure_conditions: Any required CI job fails or missing.

purpose_decision: Ensure IterationStarted context refs are sufficient, dereferenceable, and pinned; block on ambiguity.
membranes_enforced: Intent & Objective; Ontological; Accountability; Authority & Integrity
required_evidence: none (this gate validates refs/structure prior to oracle runs)
success_state_effect: Work unit may start; downstream gates may rely on pinned governed artifacts.
failure_conditions: Missing required refs; refs not dereferenceable; ref hashes missing; wrong rel types; unknown governed artifacts.
stop_triggers_on_failure: EVIDENCE_MISSING (if ref cannot be fetched); ORACLE_TAMPER (if suite mismatch); REPEATED_FAILURE
routing_portal_on_block: GovernanceChangePortal (if governance refs mismatch); ExceptionApprovalPortal (if a bounded exception is requested)

purpose_decision: Ensure compilation is deterministic given IterationStarted context and pinned environment.
success_state_effect: May proceed to next workflow gate.
failure_conditions: Non-deterministic compile outputs; missing env fingerprint.

purpose_decision: Ensure required deterministic behaviors hold (ordering, hash stability, replay).
success_state_effect: May proceed to next workflow gate.
failure_conditions: Replay diverges; nondeterministic ordering; hash instability.

purpose_decision: Ensure domain core is infrastructure-free; boundary crossings occur via ports/adapters.
failure_conditions: Forbidden imports; infra dependencies in domain; port bypass.
relief_valve: governance change (if architecture rules must change)

purpose_decision: Bind a human acceptance record to work-unit completion when required (non-release milestone).
success_state_effect: Work unit may be marked accepted; downstream packages may depend on it.
failure_conditions: Missing acceptance record; record not bound to evidence; reviewer attribution missing.

purpose_decision: Ensure evidence bundle is complete for the declared suite and mode (no missing required oracle results).
failure_conditions: Required oracle has no recorded result; missing suite hash; missing environment fingerprint.

purpose_decision: Validate evidence.gate_packet manifest schema and required fields for downstream audit/replay.
failure_conditions: Missing required fields; bad hashes; oracle_suite_hash mismatch; malformed run records.
routing_portal_on_block: GovernanceChangePortal (if schema mismatch implies governed meaning change)

purpose_decision: Ensure evidence artifacts redact/avoid secrets and comply with governed secret-handling rules.
failure_conditions: Secrets detected in evidence; unredacted logs; prohibited content captured.

purpose_decision: Ensure evidence is validated by the canonical schema validator before acceptance/release.
failure_conditions: Validator missing/disabled; evidence accepted without validation.

purpose_decision: Ensure the event store is append-only and immutable with content-addressed refs.
success_state_effect: Runtime may treat projections as trustworthy derived views.
failure_conditions: Event mutation detected; missing hashes; non-monotonic sequence; non-durable storage.

purpose_decision: Ensure all prerequisites for FreezeRecordCreated are satisfied (verified + approved + no staleness).
success_state_effect: Runtime may request FreezeRecordCreated by human actor.
failure_conditions: Approval missing; evidence missing; active exceptions not acknowledged; unresolved staleness; integrity issues.

purpose_decision: Ensure SR-PARADIGM/SR-TYPES/SR-INTENT/SR-PLAN/SR-CONTRACT/SR-SPEC/SR-ETT are mutually coherent for this instance.
failure_conditions: Detected contradiction; missing governed artifact; inconsistent definitions.

purpose_decision: Ensure depends_on edges are used for staleness propagation and supported_by for provenance only.
failure_conditions: Wrong rel usage; missing content_hash; cyclic depends_on without justification; orphan refs.

purpose_decision: Ensure harness correctly handles failure modes (missing evidence, integrity violation, budget exhaustion, staleness).
success_state_effect: May proceed to next workflow gate.
failure_conditions: Failure modes not detected; unsafe continuation; missing stop triggers.

purpose_decision: Ensure the end-to-end harness executes the canonical happy path (loop→iteration→candidate→oracles→evidence→approval→freeze).
success_state_effect: May proceed to next workflow gate.
failure_conditions: Any step in happy path fails; missing records; incorrect sequencing.

purpose_decision: Ensure minimal logs/metrics are emitted for oracle runs, portal actions, and freeze operations.
success_state_effect: May proceed to next workflow gate.
failure_conditions: Missing logs/metrics; missing traceability fields (candidate_id/run_id).

purpose_decision: Ensure run environment matches declared suite constraints (OCI digest, sandbox mode, network, FS).
success_state_effect: Evidence bundles may be used for acceptance/release gates.
failure_conditions: Environment fingerprint missing; OCI digest mismatch; network not disabled when required; sandbox mismatch.
relief_valve: decision (via GovernanceChange if suite constraints need change)

purpose_decision: Detect tamper/gap/flake/env mismatch for required oracles; block or halt on integrity violation.
success_state_effect: Evidence bundles may be used for acceptance/release gates.
failure_conditions: ORACLE_TAMPER; ORACLE_GAP; ORACLE_FLAKE; ORACLE_ENV_MISMATCH; suite hash mismatch.
routing_portal_on_block: GovernanceChangePortal (tamper/mismatch); ExceptionApprovalPortal (flake mitigation only if allowed)
contract_refs: C-OR-2; C-OR-3; C-OR-4; C-OR-5; C-OR-6; C-OR-7

purpose_decision: Ensure oracle runs are isolated (no network by default, restricted FS, deterministic mounts).
success_state_effect: Evidence bundles may be used for acceptance/release gates.
failure_conditions: Sandbox disabled; network access observed; write access outside allowed paths.

purpose_decision: Ensure all portal submissions and decisions are durably recorded (auditability).
success_state_effect: May proceed to next workflow gate.
failure_conditions: Missing submission hash; missing reviewer attribution; undurable record.

purpose_decision: Ensure projection rebuild pipeline exists and produces the same results across runs.
success_state_effect: Runtime may treat projections as trustworthy derived views.
failure_conditions: Projection rebuild fails; non-deterministic ordering; missing migration path.

purpose_decision: Ensure all derived state/projections can be rebuilt deterministically from the event log.
success_state_effect: Runtime may treat projections as trustworthy derived views.
failure_conditions: Projection depends on external DB; replay differs; missing events; hidden inputs.

purpose_decision: Ensure a human ApprovalRecorded exists for this candidate with explicit evidence + exception acknowledgement.
success_state_effect: Candidate may proceed to freeze-ready evaluation.
failure_conditions: Missing approval; approval not bound to candidate; evidence refs missing; exceptions not acknowledged explicitly.
relief_valve: resubmit approval; or route to exception/governance change

purpose_decision: Prove state can be replayed from event log and matches expected projections.
success_state_effect: May proceed to next workflow gate.
failure_conditions: Replay fails; projection mismatch; missing events.

purpose_decision: Ensure runtime components required for harness execution are healthy (event store, oracle runner, portals).
success_state_effect: May proceed to next workflow gate.
failure_conditions: Component unhealthy; connectivity errors; storage non-durable.

purpose_decision: Ensure stop triggers are configured (e.g., repeated failure threshold) and enforced by runtime.
success_state_effect: May proceed to next workflow gate.
failure_conditions: Stop triggers missing/disabled; threshold unset.

purpose_decision: Ensure UI does not create binding state; only portals + records do.
success_state_effect: May proceed to next workflow gate.
failure_conditions: UI writes binding records; UI bypasses portals.

purpose_decision: Require STRICT verification outcome for the mapped profile (core/full) for this work unit.
success_state_effect: Work unit may be accepted; release approval may be requested if other gates pass.
failure_conditions: Any required oracle fails; integrity condition fails; evidence missing; suite mismatch.
relief_valve: exception (WITH_EXCEPTIONS) only if allowed by profile + non-waivable checks

purpose_decision: Ensure all governed artifacts (SR-* docs and oracle suite hashes) are version+hash pinned for this work unit.
failure_conditions: Unpinned SR-* versions; missing content_hash; suite hash absent; inconsistent versions across refs.

purpose_decision: Ensure IterationStarted context refs are sufficient and derivation is deterministic.
membranes_enforced: Intent & Objective; Ontological; Accountability; Authority & Integrity
required_refs_depends_on: SR-TYPES; SR-CONTRACT; SR-SPEC; SR-DIRECTIVE; OracleSuite; Loop; (Base Candidate optional); (Active exceptions optional)
success_state_effect: Iteration may start
failure_conditions: Missing required refs; refs not dereferenceable; unknown governed artifact versions
stop_triggers_on_failure: EVIDENCE_MISSING (if ref cannot be fetched); ORACLE_GAP (if suite missing)
routing_portal_on_block: GovernanceChangePortal (if governance refs missing) / BudgetExtensionPortal (if blocked by budget)
notes: Keep conservative: block if unsure; escalate via portal decision.
